text: Zisas taagiap ana khuareŋ ndiv sarav, khaŋ mba Fhe Bakɨme rotu gari gumgir pani gum, mben Fhe Bakɨme Phena gari gɨɨtɨvi gumgir pani gum, mben gumgir pani, mbe ana suigɨr zav zegi, ana khaŋ mbe nzuai, “Nde ntari ga mbuav kɨɨi fara muuŋgi guma then suigɨr zav wari won ntari ga mbui kozi ndiav wari won fani ndiga zegire?
